name: Shine and Bright by yxw Art Gallery
name_original: Shine and Bright by yxw Art Gallery
description:
Welcome to Sherlyn's 1st digital exhibition: Shine and Bright by yxw Art Gallery.

Whether it be through browser or VR, immerse yourself into Sherlyn's art gallery exhibition with the paintings, drawings, photography, typography poster, branding project, and packaging displayed here, this digital experience places you into a hypnotic realm of mind and spatial analysis. 

Thanks for visiting my Art Gallery! Hope you enjoy the exhibition environment!
